name: 胡憲倫　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective: To understand how Life Cycle Thinking and Life Cycle Management can solve environmental problems. Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), one of the most important tools for analyzing and assessing environmental problems will be taught during the course of the semester. Students will also be learning a popular LCA software, SimaPro. Various applications related to LCA, such as carbon footprinting and labeling, and eco-design will also be practiced in the class.
schedule:
1. Introduction to Life Cycle and Systems Thinking and Life Cycle Management
2. Introduction to LCA, including ISO 14040 series and SimaPro Software)
3. LCA Methodology: Goal and Scope Definition
4. LCA Methodology: Life Cycle Inventory Analysis
5. LCA Methodology: Life Cycle Inventory Analysis and Life Cycle Impact Assessment
6. LCA Methodology: Life Cycle Impact Assessment
7. LCA Methodology: Interpretation and Uncertainty and Sensitivity Analysis
8. Streamlined LCA and Social/ Sustainability Life Cycle Assessment
9. (Mid-term Exam
10. EU's Environmental Footprint
11. LCA Applications: Carbon and Water Footprinting and Labeling
12. LCA Applications: Green Processes, Product Design, and Development
13. LCA Applications: Waste Management
14. LCA Applications: LCA and SDGs
15. Special Topic: Natural Capital Accounting and LCA
16. Team Project Presentation I
17. Team Project Presentation II
18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Participation and Homework：30 % Exams：40 %
Team Project (Report and Oral Presentation)： 30 %
materials:
1. Hauschild, M. Z., Rosenbaum, R. K., & Olsen, S. I. (2018). Life cycle assessment (Vol. 2018). Springer International Publishing, Cham. https://doi. org/10.1007/978-3-319-56475-3 
2. Jolliet, O. et al., Environmental Life Cycle Assessment, CRC Press, 2016
3. Lecture ppts will be distributed to students before the class!
remarks: Office hours: Wednesday morning or afternoon by appointment!

name: 曾昭衡　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective: 教學大綱：簡介作業研究 Systems Analysis 中的各式優選工具，並學習混沌理論。以生態族群的 Growth and Decay 模式為例，初窺混沌世界的奇妙，以提供往後解決問題時有不同的思考方向。混沌理論應用在物理、經濟、生物、數學的領域上，處理數百年來許多無法看透的問題有不錯進展 (包括紊流現象)，在環境領域上的應用則尚待開拓。只要處理的系統 (問題) 具有自我相似性，以混沌來處理是可行的。(課程中將視時間教進階數學軟體 Mathematica.)  Explore Chaos Theory from the Models of Growth and Decay (Simple Logistic Model, Logistic Model with Carrying Capacity, Logistic Model with Carrying Capacity and Migration).  Introduce important factors of Chaotic Behavior: Dynamics of species, Critical Reproduction Rate, Bifurcation, Butterfly effect.  Examples of Chaotic behavior: Single Species System, Two Species Competition System, Two Species Predator-Prey System.
schedule:
1. 優選工具簡介 Mathematic tools for system analysis
　　線性規劃
　　時間序列、啟發式演算法、類神經網路、灰色理論 / 模糊理論
　　賽局理論、小世界理論
2. Models of Growth and Decay 
　　Simple Logistic Model
　　Logistic Model with Carrying Capacity
　　Logistic Model with Carrying Capacity and Migration
3. Chaotic 混沌 Behavior (week 3 交 HW1)
　　Dynamics of species
　　Critical Reproduction Rate
　　Bifurcation
4. Examples of Chaotic behavior
　　Single Species System
　　Two Species Competition System
　　Two Species Predator-Prey System
5. Butterfly effect 蝴蝶效應. Deterministic or Random? (week 5 交 HW2)
6. Final Exam;

name: 楊任軒　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective:
永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed
schedule:
週次及對應主題如下 (並視上課情況適當調整)
第一週: 1. 反應工程與反應器設計簡介
第二週: 2. 溫度及壓力效應
第三週: 3. 競爭反應
第四週: 4. 理想及非理想反應器
第五週: 5. 流體 - 粒狀物及流體 - 流體反應
第六週: 6. 流體化床反應器

平時成績 (50%)
報告成績 (50%)
